snippet: To capture Russia's rapid changes and vast territory, Rafal Milach went small, delving into the lives of seven people reconciling their country's past with its ever-evolving future.
abstract: To capture Russia's rapid changes and vast territory, Rafal Milach went small, delving into the lives of seven people reconciling their country's past with its ever-evolving future.

headline.main: Russia, in Three Cities and ‘7 Rooms'
